ComicInfo.Summary:
Leonardo and Winston face formidable foes in the form of ferocious frogs!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Dan Schoening & Luis Antonio Delgado | 1 | B | Cover B | Tadd Galusha | 2 | RI | 1:10 Retailer Incentive Cover | Chris Johnson & Mark Englert | 3 |
